name: Harvest Tower Defense
description:
Defend the Farmer's magically delicious crops from his neighbor's army of familiars!

NOTE: It has been brought to my attention that the prices for the towers are cut out depending on the aspect ratio of the user's computer screen. As I work to fix this, here is the cost of each tower in the meantime:

Corn: 100

Cotton: 125

Pumpkin: 1000
